oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Practical Uses of GnRH and Prostaglandins in Bovine Reproduction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bosu, W. T. K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gonado-tropin-releasing hormone
PG
cystic ovarian degeneration
luteolysis
luteolytic agent
Ovulation
anestrus
Pyometra
Abortion
Parturition
breeding
Embryo Transfer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aims of the present report are to review the results obtained following field application of GnRHs and  Prostaglandins; list the common complaints or problems associated with their usage and to discuss the possible reasons for these complaints or failures and how they can be avoided under field conditions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1980; 137-150
